result.title: Funding, financing and procurement guide
result.description: This guide will summarize strategies methods and processes involved in aligning emobility solutions to national frameworks and priorities and outline which financial institutions and mechanisms are required to implement sustainable transport initiatives The guide will also provide results of procurement round tables and will detail strategies that inure to the benefits of all interested parties concerned in implementing the conceived innovations

result.title: Pilot cases evaluation Report
result.description: The deliverable will report about the evaluation of the DIGNITY approach carried out in the four pilots in task 42 These evaluations will be carried out against a concrete set of indicators defined by consensus in task 41 and their selected KPIs The outcome will help to understand and improve the applicability of the set of tools and methodologies and for each case study it will give evidence of the barriers and opportunities found and will be a valuable input for further advances ie to scale up demospilot cases

result.title: Technical Report on Market Research
result.description: Technical Report presenting existing barriers to market development and the identification of potential innovative market actions needed to secure EEM market development and the role of different market participants It will include a robust mapping of the actors in the mortgage market system of each of the demonstrators ie lending institutions borrowers property valuers energy experts datasystems providers investors roles and the relationships between them ie the current value chain It will also analyse the processes present in each market resources and will analyse the relevant legislative and normative environment in which the actors operate rules
